name: Nimblewright
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: understands one language known to its creator but can\'t speak

traits.Magic Resistance: The nimblewright has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Magic Weapons: The nimblewright's weapon attacks are magical.
traits.Repairable: As long as it has at least 1 hit point remaining, the nimblewright regains 1 hit point when a mending spell is cast on it.
traits.Sure-Footed: The nimblewright has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.Multiattack: The nimblewright makes three attacks: two with its rapier and one with its dagger.
actions.Rapier: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
